ygData.subject: Re: Spells, This Forum,Etc.
ygData.msgSnippet: Just so you people who are leaving know, first we all wish you didnt go, because everyone contributes good things to this list.  Secondly I agree with your
ygData.messageBody:
Just so you people who are leaving know, first we all wish you didnt go,
because everyone contributes good things to this list. Secondly I agree
with your point of view and really dont like wading through lots of this
stuff either, but this is a great forum for getting quick answers to
questions.

I use outlook for email and I can keep all the threads organized by grouping
emails by subject. This lets me delete entire threads that are
uninteresting and only read the ones that look promising.

I am sad to see you go but I have to defend the purpose of this list which
is admittedly very broad. This list is for any wizard with a question or a
comment. It is not all what you can GET from reading the list, I see it
more as what I can give and contribute to others, and just a way of relating
stories and communicating. If that is not your cup of tea then we will all
be sorry to see you go.

-Solric


-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Morris [mailto:kmorris2@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 5:04 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Spells, This Forum,Etc.


From: "Ken Morris" <kmorris2@...>

Well, that's it for me. I wish this could have turned out better, but these
endless debates are time consuming and accomplish nothing. If that's what
you wish to do Michael, then have fun. I won't have my email box filled
with this any longer.

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard

----- Original Message -----
From: Marziani, Michael D. <Michael.Marziani@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 12:24 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Spells, This Forum,Etc.


> From: "Marziani, Michael D." <Michael.Marziani@...>
>
> Ok, get ready to feel the burn. "Solric begins to cast a spell..."
>
> Sorry but the description on onelist.com says:
>
> >Eq_wizards [English] [For People Over 13] Similar lists
> >Forum for Wizards within the lands of Norrath
>
> Does it say Forum for those who only want to discuss how to play the
wizards
> and not for those who want to note the problems they see in the class and
> ideas for new spells? Didn't think so. This is the forum for us wizards.
> Everything and anything about us. If you want to only see posts that are
> about playing the game, then read the subjects and delete (that little key
> below INSERT and to the left of END) the ones that talk about other
things.
> Or go and create your own forum with a more narrow scope, but this forum
is
> for everything about wizards so deal with it or unsubscribe.
>
> -Solric of the 4th circle
>
> P.S. I am really not a mean person I just felt like going off. I know I
> could have said it in a nicer way so please flame me back to make me feel
> better about myself :)
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ken Morris [mailto:kmorris2@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 7:57 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Spells, This Forum,Etc.
>
>
> From: "Ken Morris" <kmorris2@...>
>
> You are very perceptive Valacian and, at least to me, make a lot of sense.
> I have stated before, several times, that I am very happy with the wizard
> class as it stands. Some ppl don't agree. Very well, as Valacian
suggested,
> lets get by this and focus on what we CAN do. Lets unlock the mysteries
of
> the wizard class as it stands now, not what it could be or what it should
> be. That's what the /feedback feature is for in the game.
>
> If we wish to continue to argue the different aspects of the wizard class,
> then maybe we should make a new email list for that specific focus. Don't
> get me wrong, I like a good debate as much as the next person, but I think
> Valacian is right, we have the potential of scaring ppl away, of doing the
> opposite of what this list was created for.
>
> Thanks Valacian for the reality check.
>
> Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Valacian <abryson@...>
> To: 'EQ Wizards' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 6:21 PM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Spells, This Forum,Etc.
>
>
> > From: Valacian <abryson@...>
> >
> > I can feel the wrath now... but I am ready for the comments.
> >
> > If I may comment - I don't believe that us discussing what 'would be
nice'
> for Wizard spells really helps us be Wizards. I really believe that if we
> continue to complain or comment on the apparent lack of spells/problems
with
> spells that we have, we are not going to achieve what I believe this
mailing
> list was setup for. This list is to share information between all Wizards
> within Norrath ! We are going to lose potential and current subscribers
(me
> and I'm sure others), thus losing valuable shared information because of
our
> ranting and raving about our class. Remember, Verant is probably not
> reading this forum..
> >
> > My suggestion: Let's talk about ideas and share information that will
> help each other play the class that we chose to play.
> >
> > So far, the most useful thing I have read (besides Spoiler information)
is
> the 'bug' that allows our Eye of Zoom to unlock doors. I think that's
great
> !!
> >
> > Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
> >
> >

> > http://www.onelist.com
> > ONElist has nearly 150,000 e-mail communities from which to chose!
> >
